mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple on split fountain, blue to light blue) announcing the H2O Frozen Over Tour starring Brad Paisley with Darius Rucker and Jerrod Niemann at the Bridgestone Arena on February 26. Poster features woodcuts of guitars and a paisley pattern.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
